creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
Mac OS X 10.5.2
Java 1.5.0_13-119
Cocoon 2.1.9

----

discworld:1.3.x nobby$ ./build.sh 
Buildfile: build.xml

init:
------------------- Apache Lenya 1.3.0-dev [1999-2005] ----------------
Building with Apache Ant version 1.6.5 compiled on June 2 2005
Using build file /Users/nobby/apache/lenya/branches/revolution/1.3.x/build.xml

prepare-cocoon:
Copying 213 files to /Users/nobby/apache/lenya/branches/revolution/1.3.x/build/lenya/webapp
Processing /Users/nobby/apache/lenya/branches/revolution/cocoon-2.1.9/build/webapp/WEB-INF/cocoon.xconf to /Users/nobby/apache/lenya/branches/revolution/1.3.x/build/lenya/webapp/WEB-INF/cocoon.xconf
Loading stylesheet /Users/nobby/apache/lenya/branches/revolution/1.3.x/src/webapp/WEB-INF/cocoon-xconf.xsl

BUILD FAILED
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/xml/serializer/SerializerTrace

Total time: 15 seconds

SerializerTrace is contained in serializer.jar as part of Xalan-J.  Confused because my system works without the jar.  Just committed upgrade of Xalan adding serializer.jar.

After updating, check the build/lenya/webapp/lib directories for duplicate libraries, specifically xalanj, xercesImpl, and xml-apis, keeping the latest.  (Or  do a clean build.)

If updating does not fix the error, verify serializer.jar is included in ant's classpath. (And please report so the classpath can be fixed.)
creator: solprovider@gmail.com
